metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32142 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in LibRaw linux/unix v0.20.0 allows attacker to escalate privileges via the LibRaw_buffer_datastream::gets(char*, int) in /src/libraw/src/libraw_datastream.cpp.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is a stack overflow and is limited to a denial of service on Ubuntu because of compiler hardening features.

criterions.comment: darktable: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
